options.title: -m n
options.description: Same as -d n -s n -l n -a n.

options.title: -d n
options.description: Limit the data segment per process to n bytes.

options.title: -s n
options.description: Limit the stack segment per process to n bytes.

options.title: -l n
options.description: Limit the locked physical pages per process to n bytes. This option has no effect on some operating systems.

options.title: -a n
options.description: Limit the total of all segments per process to n bytes. This option has no effect on some operating systems.

options.title: -o n
options.description: Limit the number of open file descriptors per process to n. This option has no effect on some operating systems.

options.title: -p n
options.description: Limit the number of processes per uid to n.

options.title: -f n
options.description: Limit output file sizes to n bytes.

options.title: -c n
options.description: Limit core file sizes to n bytes.

options.title: -r n
options.description: Limit the resident set size to n bytes. This limit is not enforced unless physical memory is full.

options.title: -t n
options.description: Limit the CPU time to n seconds. This limit is not enforced except that the process receives a SIGXCPU signal after n seconds.
